Comments - Scabble or green cut interface in accordance with Type B construction joint to NZS 3109

○ For joints, the surface of the concrete may be prepared by green cutting (using high velocity air/water jets or vigorous wire brush) to remove all laitance and inferior surface concrete after the concrete has hardened sufficiently to prevent loosening of any aggregate which is not removed.
